description:
Acropolis is a sandbox strategy game where you play as a moving city.

Known Issues:
  • you cannot build in the middle of the grid / in a certain section of the grid.
  • Settings & Debug menu's are not implemented yet
  • Expanded Tooltip Gain & Loss doesn't update
  • Pause & Speed up buttons are not functional 
  • Switching between world & City will REMOVE ALL BUILDINGS!!!
